Title: Accor, InterGlobe unveil ‘ibis’ hotel in Hyderabad
Content: Accor Hotels and InterGlobe Hotels on Wednesday announced an investment of Rs.900 crore in their economy brand of hotels ‘ibis’. They had invested about Rs. 1,300 crore on the project so far. Announci
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: Accor Hotels and InterGlobe Hotels on Wednesday announced an investment of Rs.900 crore in their economy brand of hotels ‘ibis’. They had invested about Rs. 1,300 crore on the project so far. Announci
